content:
On my WSL setup (the repo is in the linux filesystem) two tests have been failing for a while (on the latest master)

ui/linkage-attr/issue-10755.rs: 

error: could not exec the linker `llllll`
   |
   = note: Permission denied (os error 13)

ui/process/process-spawn-nonexistent.rs

thread 'main' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)`
  left: `PermissionDenied`,
 right: `NotFound`',

Seems like not finding something actually returns NotFound on my system
OS: Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS on Windows 10 x86_64 Kernel: 5.10.60.1-microsoft-standard-WSL2

Does anyone have the same problem or a solution?

I've just added the ignore label locally, which does work, but is a bit annoying sometimes
You might want to check #91282 with some suggested workarounds. I personally have not run into this, though.
